tool_description: An API that generates 10 simple math problems, either addition, subtraction, multiplication, or division with either single digits numbers, double digit numbers, or one of either.
title: Simple Math Problems

api_list.name: Get Addition Problems
api_list.description: This endpoint retrieves 10 addition problems, with one correct answer and three incorrect answers. The additional parameter specifies if the problem includes single digit numbers using 'single', double digit numbers using 'double', or one of either using 'singledouble'.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://simple-math-problems.p.rapidapi.com/addition/{digits}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "simple-math-problems.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
